subject: RS
title: Religion in America
description: The course examines religion in the American context regarding issues like secularization, the nature and the influence of sects (e.g., Mormonism, Pentecostalism), Protestant revivalism and televangelism, and the impact of non-Christian traditions (e.g., Buddhism, Islam). [Note: This course fulfils an Area 1 requirement for Religious Studies majors.]
